alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest; Langlade; Marathon; Northern Marinette County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 11:26AM CST until January 10 at 6:00AM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...SNOW AND STRONG WINDS EXPECTED THIS AFTERNOON INTO TONIGHT... .A strong winter system will move north into the Great Lakes. Light to moderate snow will spread back into much of eastern WI this afternoon. A period of heavy snow is possible in the Fox Valley and lake shore this afternoon into early this evening, impacting the evening commute. Wind gusts from the northeast to north will also increase to 30 to 40 mph during the afternoon into this evening, reducing visibility and resulting in blowing and drifting snow in open areas. Hazardous travel conditions are expected at times, with the worst conditions occurring during the afternoon and early evening. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations up to 1 inch and a light glaze of ice. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. Some drizzle or freezing drizzle is also possible. * WHERE...Marathon, Langlade, Florence, Forest, and Northern Marinette County Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Florence; Forest; Langlade; Marathon; Northern Marinette County
